DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate the relative bioavailability of Cetirizine Hydrochloride/Pseudoephedrine Hydrochloride 5 mg/120 mg ER tablets under fed conditions.
DOC.brief_title: To Demonstrate the Relative Bioavailability of Cetirizine Hydrochloride/Pseudoephedrine Hydrochloride 5 mg/120 mg Extended Release (ER) Tablets Under Fed Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal finding on physical exam, medical history, or clinical laboratory results on screening. Positive test results for HIV or hepatitis B or C. Treatment for drug or alcohol dependence.
